strapiPost.title: Trailblazers + ETHIC To Provide Biking Classes For Adults
strapiPost.content:
Trailblazers + ETHIC, formally known as BikeNWA, recently announced it will be offering free or low-cost biking classes for adults who would like to build confidence in cycling. 

  • Never too late to learn: The first class is called Adult First Ride and will be open to the public. This class is specifically for adults who have either never ridden a bike or havenâ€™t since they were a child. It will be on April 4 at Pedal-it-Forward in Rogers. 
  • Pedaling: As the population in NWA continues to grow, Trailblazers + Ethic believe active and clean transportation options is the way forward, and people should be educated on bike safety as well as have the opportunity to learn. For more information, to sponsor, or to volunteer for this program you can email ETHIC here.

Read the full KNWA story HERE.
